short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sidekick is a web extension for ACO members that works on top of a practice's EMR to provide important medical information.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a testing version used to verify the quality of future releases. Not for general use by permitted userbase.
